document.full_text: as illinois governor, george ryan had the political courage to declare a moratorium on capital punishment. but as the punishment was formally abolished this week, mr. ryan was in his cell in federal prison.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: a history-making week to consider the 2 sides of george ryan
lines_and_colors: as illinois governor, george ryan had the political courage to declare a moratorium on capital punishment. but as the punishment was formally abolished this week, mr. ryan was in his cell in federal prison.
